name: Pirates Pinball HD
description:
Welcome to Pirates Pinball - professional pinball simulator for tvOS!
With fast 3D graphics and realistic physics, this game will blow your mind. All parts of pinball table are real objects and you can see how it works!

FEATURES

– Awesome 3D cinematic graphics
– Original music, sound effects, and gameplay!
– Multiball! Play with several balls simultaneously!
– local and online high scores (via Game Center)
– hours and hours of pure action in your very own hands
